title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Reasons for optimism: Clay's kids return to maskless school. NFL plays game in front of full stadium. Dismal education stats for Newark. Lockdowns and remote learning hit minorities hardest. The Democrats who closed schools now pretending to be trying to keep them open. DeSantis refuses to mandate masks in schools. Cori Bush clings to defund the police, while using taxpayer-funded private security, claims death threats from "white supremacists" and that her body is worth being on earth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
